blog.name: writerbrenna
blog.description: we are each the villain in someone else’s story, and sometimes in our own

title: day 2: brawl
body:
there’s something about a brawl;
about the adrenaline, the sweat dripping down your brow.
the mind-numbing exhaustion, the deep satisfaction.
you fight like you fuck; trading back and forth,
it’s all a dance, a game.
Meaningless, and yet so Meaningful.

blood dripping from your wounds, bruises on your knuckles.
grinning at the prospect of a good old fashioned beawl.
or a good old fashioned fuck.
you fight and you hit and you kick and you scream,
in pain or in ecstasy it’s all the same.
and maybe one day you’ll stop fighting, and one day you’ll stop fucking
and maybe one day you’ll learn to, get the chance to,

love instead.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

summary: Beau Week, Day 2: Battered and Bruised, Brawl  AO3 Beau is thirteen. Her hair is a mess- cut short, cropped tight to her head...
body:
Beau Week, Day 2: Battered and Bruised, Brawl

AO3

Beau is thirteen. Her hair is a mess- cut short, cropped tight to her head (clearly done by an inexperienced hand). There is a bruise blooming around her left eye, a cut on her lip, scratches on her cheeks, and blood on her knuckles. She glares up at her mother defiantly.

Her mother speaks. “What have you done to your hair?!”

Beau swallows a mouthful of blood to respond. “Long hair is stupid. I hate it.”

Her mother purses her mouth. Bites back other words for later. Onto the present problem. “And, pray tell, what in the Law-Bearer’s name possessed you to attack several of your peers?”

“Donovon tried to push me into a mud puddle. I pushed him first. His friends didn’t like that.”

You should see them, she thinks. She grins a little at the memory, at the feeling that rushes through her veins when she throws a punch, the knowledge that she’d won, before the teachers pulled her away. Her grin melts under her mother’s scrutiny.

Her mother tuts. “You should know better than to get into fights, Beauregard. You aren’t a boy, you are a lady, and you are to act like it. Do better.”

Her mother walks out of the room, skirt swishing behind her. Probably to the drawing room to crochet and drink too much wine.

Beau’s father wanted a son. Beau’s mother wanted a doll. Beau isn’t either. She clenches her fist and tastes blood on her tongue.

Beau is twenty-three. She is three months free of the Cobalt Soul. She is walking, alone, down the flattened dirt road when she hears rustling in the bushes. She stops. Tenses. Hears the whistling of an arrow loosed, and dodges. She whirls around, sees bandits- two, three. Their armor is even more ramshackle than she’d’ve expected. They seem nervous, unsure. New at this.

Beau smiles. Readies her fists. Tastes the memory of iron in her mouth. Leaps forward, relishing the rush.

Sitting later, in her small campsite, bodies suitably searched, re-wrapping the bandages on her arms, she smiles.

blog.name: valkyrievale
blog.title: Lord of the Dark Arts
blog.description:
✧✧✧ Hello! I'm a self taught artist who spends a lot of time in her art cave. I like to experiment with many mediums and share my creations with others. From drawing in graphite to sculpting with clay to drawing digitally, I make a lot of stuff! ✧✧✧
OCs galore, sketches, and the ever so rare fan art. Either to the left or in the drop down menu is a link to my OC list page, where you can find my hundred or so children.
Commissions will be coming soon...ish

from someone more knowledgeable in the topic
summary: Have a prompt:  Scanlan has a dark secret. He is deeply entrenched in the world of porcelain figurine collectors. He goes to...
question: Have a prompt:  Scanlan has a dark secret. He is deeply entrenched in the world of porcelain figurine collectors. He goes to auctions, he attends conventions, he even has a sizable collection of his own.
answer:
I don’t know what the fuck this even is, but he meets Pike at one of those things, selling all her limited edition shit, and they hit it off. 

With porcelain figurine collections.

tags: the song is jenny's song from game of thrones
and i cried when i first heard it
summary: “in the holds of the kings who are gone jenny would dance with her ghosts ones who she'd lost and ones she had found and ones...
body:
“in the holds of the kings who are gone
jenny would dance with her ghosts
ones who she’d lost and ones she had found
and ones who had loved her the most
ones who’d been gone for so very long
she couldn’t remember their names
they spun her round on the damp old stone
spun away all her sorrow and pain
and she never wanted to leave
never wanted to leave“

look at me and tell me this isn’t yasha’s song.

summary: Yeza shaved his sideburns once and only once. Luke was a baby and when he saw Yeza with a clean face for the first time he burst...
question: Yeza shaved his sideburns once and only once. Luke was a baby and when he saw Yeza with a clean face for the first time he burst into tears and refused to let this strange, clean shaven man hold him.
answer:
Veth touched his cheek, smile widening as her fingers roved over smooth skin instead of the bushy overgrown hair he usually had, look nothing short of approving to finally have him do what she’s asked many times before, “You’re so handsome, babe.” she said, kissing his cheek.

Yeza sighed, blushing as he smiled back at her, “I wanted to try it, not sure if I like it yet.” he admitted. 

She laughed, grabbing his hand to lead him to Luke’s nursery, “I know a way I could help you like it better then having a mess just, there. I’ll prove it, but now Luke should see too.” she said. 

Yeza nodded, scratching his cheek, a bit more itchy then usual now, while Veth went about picking Luke up out of his little play pen, holding him close when she walked back over to him, “Look at daddy’s new haircut, Luke! Isn’t he handsome?” 

Luke looked at Yeza after a bit more prompting, and stared for a few seconds, looking confused and upset. Before either of them could figure out what was wrong, he burst into tears and tried to hide behind Veth’s arms, face buried in her neck as he tried to keep away from Yeza. 

He screamed when Veth tried to hand him over to Yeza, refusing to be let go by his mother, and the two looked at each other in dawning understanding. 

The smile Yeza had was amused and teasing, and he spoke despite the warning look Veth was giving him, “I guess Luke prefers my hair exactly the way it should be. That settles it then, I won’t do any shaving next time.” 

Veth sighed, looking put out, rocking the child in her arms until he calmed enough to set back into his play pen, so she could pull Yeza into a hug and rest her head on his shoulder, “Fine. Don’t expect me to be happy about it though.” 

Yeza laughed, hugging her back, knowing she loved his look and she just complained to be contrary. She liked his sideburns, he’d get her to admit it eventually.

blog.title: Next Stop
blog.description:
Hallo traveler and thanks for stopping
by
•This blog contains things I like and my art, currently very much into Critical Role C1 and Oxventure.
•Klick on My Art, for fanarts and other stuff, I use the tag "art by me" for those on mobile.
•Feel free to ask me anything you want.
Have a nice day! Find me on twitter: @Tyurru

blog.name: criticalcaleb
blog.title: anybody can make lights
blog.description:
micah • 19 • follow/reply from @notskeleton

bidet, everyone! critical role has more or less taken over my life, so i figured it was about time that my current obsession got its own space. feel free to shoot me an ask any time! i'd love any excuse to talk about this great cast and their characters. oh, and also i technically draw and write sometimes.

tags: RUBIK’S CUBE GIRL IF YOU’RE OUT THERE
summary: Caleb is one of those people who can solve a Rubik’s cube in seconds and one day one the the M9 is fucking around with one and...
question: Caleb is one of those people who can solve a Rubik’s cube in seconds and one day one the the M9 is fucking around with one and leaves it on the table so he nonchalantly picks it up and solves it, and then passes it to Nott to mix it up for him, they keep going back and forth with Nott spending more time mixing it up till one of the other M9 notice
answer:
no listen i met someone who did this!!! it was at summer camp, and when we had down time after lunch a bunch of us older kids would chill in the Cool Older Kids Lounge That Had AC™️ and she would absentmindedly solve her rubik’s cube and pass it off to someone to scramble it! our 13/14 year old minds were blown!!! i don’t remember he name but i do remember that she looked like Annabeth Chase from pjo…

ALL THAT BEING SAID! i love this head canon so much bc i have experienced it firsthand. thank you for sharing!!

tags: liam and ashley's friendship and how it affects their characters' interactions is underrated
and now I'm thinking of all the great Vax and Pike stuff we got in C1...
summary: One of my favorite ongoing campaign 2 side conversations: A couple of times now Liam has off-handedly mentioned how few...
body:
One of my favorite ongoing campaign 2 side conversations:

A couple of times now Liam has off-handedly mentioned how few hitpoints Caleb has, and Ashley has reacted immediately with appalled disbelief, and then Liam has had to confirm for her that yes, his character is in fact that weak.

Frequent follow-up Yasha action: something along the lines of “Oh god, gotta protect the squishy wizard.”
